sentence: Barnette has been endorsed by former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn, Pennsylvania Senator Doug Mastriano, the Club for Growth, and the anti-abortion group Susan B. Anthony List.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: Dr. Oz called out an Islamophobic tweet from a GOP opponent who said 'Pedophilia is a Cornerstone of Islam'

author: Matthew Chapman
title: Pa. Senate GOP candidate Kathy Barnette photographed marching toward Capitol with Proud Boys on Jan. 6
